statements: DELETE FROM financial_data WHERE stock_symbol = 'AAPL' AND revenue < 100000;
DELETE FROM financial_data WHERE id = 100 AND stock_symbol = 'AAPL';
DELETE FROM financial_data WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' AND (revenue < 10000 OR expenses > 5000);
DELETE FROM correlations WHERE variable1 = 'Sales' AND variable2 = 'Expenses';
DELETE FROM financial_data WHERE id = 100 AND variable_name = 'Revenue';
DELETE FROM correlations WHERE correlation_coefficient < 0.5 AND (variable1 = 'Expenses' OR variable2 = 'Profit');
DELETE FROM sector_data WHERE sector_name = 'Technology' AND industry = 'Software'
DELETE FROM correlations WHERE variable1 = 'A' AND variable2 = 'B';
